core/config.value: OpenSlides is a free web based presentation and assembly system for visualizing and controlling agenda, motions and elections of an assembly.

data.helpText: Server settings required to activate Jitsi Meet integration.

data.helpText: Server settings required to activate Jitsi Meet integration.
